data.name: روماک ایده
data.description: Romak IDE is a trading company based in Iran, Tehran active in the mining and metal industries. Based on the valuable experience of our team; we have built a strong network of sourcing, carriage and port services of a variety of Iron and other Mineral products. We are honored to have one of the best teams in bulk, and containerized shipment of Direct Reduced Sponge Iron and also our team has been involved in exporting million tons of ferrous products such as Iron Ore and Concentrate.
